code: import{createSelector}from"reselect";var cartItemsSelector=function cartItemsSelector(state){return state.cart;};export var selectCartItems=createSelector([cartItemsSelector],function(cart){return cart.cartItems;});export var selectCartItemsQuantity=createSelector([selectCartItems],function(cartItems){return cartItems.reduce(function(total,cartItem){return total+cartItem.quantity;},0);});export var selectHiddenStatus=createSelector([cartItemsSelector],function(cart){return cart.hidden;});export var selectCartTotal=createSelector([selectCartItems],function(cartItems){return cartItems.reduce(function(total,cartItem){return total+cartItem.quantity*cartItem.price;},0);});
